perturbation.original_text: (a) Exclusive Appointment. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Distributor Agreement, Company hereby appoints and grants Distributor the exclusive right to sell and distribute the Products to customers that Distributor introduce and confirmed by Company, (in all territory of United State of America (USA) and to render other services as a distributor for Company as set forth herein. Distributor shall limit its activities with respect to the Products to Customers located within the Territory and refrain from selling or otherwise transferring, directly or indirectly, the Products to any person outside the Territory, without the express written consent of Company. Company shall not sell or otherwise supply, directly or indirectly, the Products to any Distributor's Customer's, except by sale through the Distributor. The Company shall not contact any of Distributor's Customer's for any reason, without the prior written approval of Distributor.
perturbation.changed_text: (a) Appointment. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Distributor Agreement, Company hereby appoints Distributor the right to sell and distribute the Products to customers that Distributor introduce and confirmed by Company, (in all territory of United State of America (USA) and to render other services as a distributor for Company as set forth herein. Distributor shall limit its activities with respect to the Products to Customers located within the Territory.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'exclusive' the distributor's rights are no longer clearly defined. Further sections refer to the distributor as having exclusive rights, this is now contradicted.

perturbation.original_text: (e) Payment. Upon Customer's acceptance of any order, Distributor shall submit to Customer via wire transfer at least Twenty-Five Percent (25%) of the total order price. Distributor shall submit to Customer via wire transfer the remaining balance upon receipt Packing List and Bill of landing documents, from origin in Brazil Farm.
perturbation.changed_text: (e) Payment. Upon Customer's acceptance of any order, Distributor shall submit payment. Specific payment terms will be negotiated on a per order basis.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specifics about payment amounts and timing and replacing them with a vague reference to future negotiation, the contract creates uncertainty. This contradicts later sections relying on a fixed payment structure, such as those related to dispute resolution.

perturbation.original_text: SCHEDULE A PRICES AND DISCOUNT VOLUME PRICES Subject to Company's right to increase the price only once per year per the terms and restrictions contained in the Agreement, and Company's right to decrease the price at any time upon notice, the Products shall be sold by Company to Distributor at the following Prices and Volume Discount Prices. Prices are in US Dollars. ‚óè $9 (US) per kilogram Ex-work Incoterms. (Brazil Farm). Distributor will be appropriately credited should Distributor make payment related to an order and later determine that it had achieved a greater discount per the above.
perturbation.changed_text: SCHEDULE A PRICES AND DISCOUNT VOLUME PRICES Subject to Company's right to increase the price only once per year per the terms and restrictions contained in the Agreement, and Company's right to decrease the price at any time upon notice, the Products shall be sold by Company to Distributor at Prices to be determined. Distributor will be appropriately credited should Distributor make payment related to an order and later determine that it had achieved a greater discount per the above.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the specific price of $9 per kilogram and replacing it with 'Prices to be determined' directly contradicts prior sections that reference established prices. This creates an internal inconsistency, making Schedule A's function unclear.
